Decentralize the internet with CD.EOS

The Problem With Current CDNs

  • CDN’s play a very important role to improve user experience in the internet
  • In 2017 CDN’s processed more than 50% of the top 10k website
  • Over 80% of the market share is in the hands of 5 players

We are working to disrupt this model by bringing decentralization to the internet

Solution

Why CD.EOS?

EOS' blockchain will help us execute on this vision

So what's next, how do we execute on this vision?
